name: European Institute of Peace
membership: The EIP is member of the European Peacebuilding Liaison Office (EPLO), http://eplo.org/.
goal: The EIP is an independent partner to the European Union and Europe, augmenting its global peace agenda through mediation and informal dialogue. The Institute pursues multi-track diplomacy and acts as a flexible, external tool in support of EU mediation efforts where the EU has limited freedom to act. It also serves as an operational hub, and connects existing expertise and shares knowledge and lessons on European mediation.
interests: Development, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid
euInitiatives: Mediation and Dialogue, EU Foreign Policy and External Relations, CFSP, Neighbourhood Policy, Enlargement, Development Policy.
